segments.text: I see the kids in the kitchen, and it makes me smile a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is brave, climbing that stool despite it wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's right there, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the sink is overflowing behind them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, and the mom doesn't see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes so carefully, lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is lovely, brightening the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, that puddle on the floor looks slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds; the boy's reaching so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What fun they're having, the little rascals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, plenty for both.
segments.speaker: PAR
